mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.pid as "pid", a.readtime as "readtime", a.pagenum as "pagenum", a.p as "p", a.create_date as "createDate", a.create_by as "createBy", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.update_by as "updateBy", a.del_flag as "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a. md5) FROM file_sort_list a

select a.*, CONCAT(left(a.n2 / a.n1 * 100, 5),'%') as "s1", CONCAT(left(a.n3 / a.n1 * 100, 5),'%') as "s2" from ( SELECT count(1) as "n1", sum(case when a.type = '1' then 1 else 0 end) as "n2", sum(case when a.type = '2' then 1 else 0 end) as "n3", sum(case when a.newid is not null then 1 else 0 end) as "n4", sum(a.size) as "l1", d.d1
FROM file_sort_list a left join ( select max(create_date) as "d1" from file_sort_list where del_flag = '0' )d on 1=1 WHERE a.del_flag = '0' )a
mapper.insert:

mapper.delete: update file_sort_list set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id}
